title: News for April, 2024
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:newspaper]]

[[div class="pseudocrumbs" style="text-align: center"]]
**[[[news|Site News Hub]]]**
**Â« [[[news-03-2024|March 2024]]] | __[[[news-04-2024|April 2024]]]__ | [[[news-05-2024|May 2024]]] Â»**
[[/div]]

[[span class="placard"]][[size 75%]] **DISCLAIMER:** This is the Site News for the English Branch of the SCP Wiki. The opinions of the individual members of the Site News team that are presented in each edition of the Site News are their own thoughts and are not meant to be representative of the Site News team as a whole nor are they representative of the staff body as a whole. If you take issue with any of the contents, then feel free to reach out to the editor(s) and they will review the contents to see if there are any edits that need to be made. We intend to always deliver interesting content to you, and we understand that there may be times where controversial or unpopular opinions will be presented whether by our writers or our editor(s). Thank you for your understanding![[/size]][[/span]]

[[div class="anchor"]]
[[div class="tocbox"]]
[[div class="toc-u"]]
[[toc]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="breaker"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Editorial
[[/div]]
The Spanish-speaking Branch of the SCP Wiki is hosting a convention in Mexico City on May 18th! There will be discussions on the horror genre, workshops on literary creation and art, and several featured works of SCP site members. Admission is free! You can find out more in the convention's discord server here: https://discord.gg/FdnN9f7s4u. 
[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By ParallelPotatoes//[[/span]]
[[/>]]
------

Another bit of news out of the Spanish-speaking Branch of the Wiki this month; they are hosting a Dark Arts Contest called 'Necronomicon'! How's that for a clever name? The rules are simple, you and one other author must collaborate to create an SCP, Tale, or GoI Format that depicts a cursed object/individual. But wait, there's more! It's also an art contest! For more information on the contest, you can check out the hub [http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/necronomicon-2024 here!]

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Uncle Nicolini//[[/span]]
[[/>]]
------
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Writing Prompts
[[/div]]

Site News is bringing you monthly writing prompts! Every month there will be user-submitted prompts to help inspire new pieces. Participation in these prompts is completely optional, and any pages based on the prompts will be featured in the next issue of Site News! If you're interested in submitting a prompt for next Site News, send a wikidot PM to [[*user ParallelPotatoes]]. One prompt submission per person, and up to five prompts will be shown in each edition of Site News. 

This month's writing prompts are below! 

[[size x-large]]Mix & Match[[/size]] //Submitted by Merehrab//
Pick 3 random scps that don't already have tales written about them and write a tale that connects them together in a way that makes sense. Bonus points if one SCP is from early series one or two and another one is from the more recent series (seven, eight, or nine).

[[size x-large]]Human Emeritus[[/size]] //Submitted by Caospin//
What does it mean to be a "human emeritus"?

If you write an entry inspired by this or a previous month's prompts, feel free to send a wikidot PM to [[*user ParallelPotatoes]] to have it featured in the next Site News! There isn't a time limit on getting prompt submissions featured, so feel free to write for a previous month's prompts as well! [[footnote]]Please note that in the event of an official contest, contest entries that were inspired by a Site News prompt will be featured the month after the contest ends.[[/footnote]]
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Features Last Month
[[/div]]

[[=]]
+++ Top Articles of the Month
[[/=]]

Ratings of course do not mean everything, but they are representative of what people happened to like seeing at the time. With this in mind, the following are the top-rated works last month, so if by some chance you haven't encountered them yet, be sure to check them out!

[[div class="f-flex"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Top-Rated SCP
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-8726]]] by //Uncle Nicolini//: **Researcher James, Age 6, Eternally**

{{SCP-8726 is not to be referred to by its SCP designation in person and is instead to be referred to as 'James'.}}

[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Top-Rated Non-SCP
[[/=]]

[[[art:the-king-has-died|the king has died]]] by //rottingraisins//

{{Kid, listen. Shit isn't __fair__ here.}}

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

-----

[[=]]
+++ Front Page Features
[[/=]]

Every month, an article is selected from each of the three common article types: SCP, Tale, and Group of Interest Format. These three articles are displayed on the front page for the month to bring further recognition to them.

[[=]]
//If you would like to view the previous front page features, you can view the archive for the SCPs [[[featured-scp-archive-ii | here]]], the archive for the Tales [[[featured-tale-archive-ii | here]]], and the archive for the GoI Formats [[[featured-goi-format-archive | here]]]!//
[[/=]]

[[div class="f-flex three"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ SCP Article
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-4386]]] by //CyrusFiredawn//: **B Gone, B**

{{As events occur in reality, they subsequently occur within the simulation following an average delay of 23 hours. SCP-4386-02 through 05 are unaware that their observed world is a simulation.}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Tale
[[/=]]

[[[hippocampus-of-triton|A Brief History Of Neptune Station]]] by //thd-glasses//

{{The First Moonbase In Human Historyâ€¦ Would It Be The Beginning Of The Space Era?}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ GoI-Format
[[/=]]

[[[ambrose-esterberg|Ambrose Esterberg]]] by //Ralliston//

{{In collaboration with Marshall, Carter & Darke, the newest establishment will open with the wonders of a whole new, special all-night dinner event, designed for the Fae elites of the city to remember their civilization like it was millennia ago.}}


[[/div]]
[[/div]]

------

[[=]]
+++ Reviewers' Spotlights
[[/=]]

Works are featured on the siteâ€™s front page as part of the Reviewersâ€™ Spotlight, which acknowledges the time and effort spent by forum reviewers helping other authors develop and edit and their works for the mainsite. Each month, community members are encouraged to nominate forum reviewers who have been both particularly helpful and active. Members of the Forum Criticism Team will then discuss the nominations, and select four prominent reviewers to choose the monthâ€™s Reviewersâ€™ Spotlight front-page features.

[[=]]
//If you would like to view previous spotlights, you can view the archive for them [[[reviewers-spotlight-archive | here]]]!//
[[/=]]

[[div class="f-flex"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 1st of March
[[/=]]

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ SCP Data & Trends
[[/div]]

All the goings-on of the site condensed into bite-sized takeaways! Is there a statistic or figure you would be interested in knowing? Let us know and we can feature it next time!
[[=]]
[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/april2024-1.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/april2024-2.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/april2024-3.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/april2024-4.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/april2024-6.png]]

[[/=]]
Like before, we are still renovating this section. It will likely be a couple months, but we will soon have a nice little stats section here. In the meantime, please enjoy our monthly charts.

Also, what do __YOU__ want to see in the monthly stats section? Any data you want to know about? Please leave a comment about it in the Discussion page or use [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfTm7UWLqekHiapGYcbns0GAY1jtIB0Xy93FqQPxc2S2I-wVA/viewform this anonymous google form.]

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Data Analysis Team//[[/span]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ New Content this Month
[[/div]]

There is a multitude of wonderful works that are posted to the Wiki every month whether they be SCP articles, Tales, GoI Formats, Art pages, Author Pages, Essays, and more! Below, we have all of the creations for this month listed out by week and type (except for art pages, we did that earlier!) We have added little emojis next to articles that qualify to add some additional content. Below we have listed out the emojis we use and what they mean. Be sure to give them a look!

ğŸ¤ = **Co-authored works** - It is always interesting to see the dynamics of how people work together!
ğŸŒ = **International works** - Articles translated from one of our international branches!
ğŸ’¯ = **Articles rated at +100 and higher** - These are articles that have seen success and should be celebrated for it!
ğŸ“ˆ = **SCP articles rated under +30 and Tales and GoI Formats rated under +20** - Let's show these a little love!
